thread.title: Anonyoumous
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Anonyoumous

author: Anonyoumous
title: Anonyoumous
text: I bought a recliner for $100 plus. It was coming apart within two weeks and the material is cheap. I thought I was getting a deal but the recliner is cheap and is not working well and I have only had it alittle over a month now. They say they will replace it or give you a better deal but its not worth the time. You still get the same product.
